title: Ticket #7861: Document "DISK" knob
description:
There is a knob called "DISK" that specifies (in KB) how much disk space to advertise for the slots (similar to "MEMORY"). (This knob is useful for the exec node containers...)

Document this knob in the Config Macros page, since it's not currently documented.
remarks:
2020-Nov-16 13:18:11 by matyas:
I would say "execute partition" instead of "machine" but otherwise it looks good.

2020-Nov-16 13:25:26 by matyas:
Also, I would put the effect first and the default afterward. Something like

Tells HTCondor how much disk space to advertise as being available for use by jobs. If DISK is not specified, HTCondor will advertise the amount of free space on your execute partition, minus RESERVED_DISK (if set).
